post.author: 황성규
post.content:
충분히 이해가 갑니다. 저도 이민오기전에 혹시 회사에 알려질까봐 걱정했던 기억이 있습니다. Bran씨의 의견을 충분히 반영하는 방향으로 사이트를 운영하겠습니다.
Bran wrote: > I just want u to consider the reason why some members did not write their private information. > > In my case I'd be glad to but I couldn't. Why? I'm in Korea and I work for the company I can't reveal now. > > Conclusionally, If u all support the policy leveraging members because of a regional fact ... I will follow ur decisions. > > I will expect to be a formal member after immigration some day. > > Thanks.
post.title: RE: My opinion
